lead_paragraph: Russian Sports Minister Vitaly Mutko on Thursday denied allegations in a German documentary that he intervened to conceal a soccer player's positive drug test, dismissing the report as "laughable" and "implausible."

headline.print_headline: Russian Minister Denies Covering Up Doping
headline.main: Russian Minister Denies Covering Up Doping
